name: Impossiball
description:
IMPOSSIBALL is a silly and strange adventure made by a two man team where you must rescue "The Golden pin" from the clutches of evil whilst traveling through time. Take on many difficult levels such as
*The Wild West
*An Ancient Temple
*A Pirate Ship
*A Cyberpunk City
*Outer Space
*A Medieval Town
And Many More!

In IMPOSSIBALL you play as a red Bowling ball that won't stop rolling and you must avoid whatever obstacles are thrown your way!
